body_html: You can post your code, @AnlanSun, but you will have the largest chance of someone finding your problem if you reduce the size of your code to the smallest piece of code that can reproduce the problem. That exercise of reduction also stands a great chance of allowing you to re-check your code for errors. Please do that first and post your code.

body: You can post your code, @AnlanSun, but you will have the largest chance of someone finding your problem if you reduce the size of your code to the smallest piece of code that can reproduce the problem. That exercise of reduction also stands a great chance of allowing you to re-check your code for errors. Please do that first and post your code.
